title: Fractal Block World weapon fandesigns
description:
My fan-made designs for two of the unseen weapons from Fractal Block World. Drawn in Krita.
I wanted each to fit with the aesthetics of the enemies that drop ammo for them. Laser ammo is dropped by Goons, a scarred zombie-like enemy, so I based it on a medical syringe gun. Minigun ammo is dropped by Spiders, so I made it look like it was some kind of organic insectoid weapon (not that spiders are insects, but you understand what I mean...)
